title: Should You Let A Job Applicant Know About A HUGE Mistake On Their Resume?
description:
You're in the process of hiring someone for a position at your company. As you go through resumes, you notice an applicant has made a MAJOR mistake on theirs.
Because of this mistake, you're not going to hire them. However, you want them to know about their error. Do you tell them or not?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
